text: Robert Ljubičić (born 14 July 1999) is an Austrian footballer who plays for SKN St. Pölten. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austria youth international footballers Category:Croatian footballers Category:Croatia youth international footballers Category:Austrian people of Croatian descent Category:Austrian Football Bundesliga players Category:SKN St. Pölten players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Robert Ljubičić
